entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 a.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 10:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:27 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 9:27 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches in low lying areas early in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:27 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
